subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LaMarcus Aldridge had 20 points, Steve Blake added 19, including a 3-pointer with nine seconds left, and the Portland Trail Blazers spoiled Toronto Coach Jay Triano’s home debut with a 98-97 win against the Raptors on Sunday. Jermaine O’Neal had a season-high 24 points with 6 blocks but it was not enough to keep the Raptors from their fourth straight loss.
